description.value:
A Trained Doctor or Med-Serivtor with recognised skill Int 50, Medicae +10

Requirements

For Extended Care, Cost is per day. Cost of service may vary with location and the honesty/charitability of those that offer it.

Effect: Rare

Notes: 150 T
